EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CALL - Toronto IT Community Appreciation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We have a limited number of spots left for this Thursday Toronto IT Community Appreciation Event at Stryke Target Range, so hurry and RSVP! Join us on Thursday, October 26th for good drinks, good food, and an afternoon our community of awesome technologists networking together. Toronto IT Community Appreciation <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]>
Where: Stryke Target Range 738 Dundas St. E, Toronto, ON M5A 2C3 Thursday, October 26th 4:00pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]>
Last call!
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
